恡字的基本解释

恡
lìn
同“吝”。

恡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lìn］
［《廣韻》良刃切，去震，來。］
亦作“恡1”。亦作“悋1”。亦作“1”。“鄰2”的被通假字。
(1)悔恨；遗憾。
(2)吝啬；爱惜；舍不得。
(3)贪婪；鄙俗。
(4)羞耻；以之为耻。
(5)通“遴”。艰难。
(6)通“遴”。见“吝選”。
(7)方言。犹韧，不脆。

恡字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　恡； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页384第32
【正字通】同悋。

恡
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lìn］
["Guang Yun" cuts with a good blade, go to shake, come. ]
Also known as "恡1". Also known as "sloppy 1". Also called "1". "Neighbor 2" has been passed falsely.
(1) Regret; regret.
(2) Be stingy; cherish; reluctant.
(3) Greed; vulgarity.
(4) Shame; ashamed of it.
(5) Through "Lin". difficult.
(6) Through "Lin". See "Stingy election".
(7) Dialects. Still tough, not brittle.
